Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only boasts high-quality materials but also innovative features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than $150. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $200 for this product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
